title: Ping spikes
body: Last couple of days I haven't really played league because so much bs happens that just makes me close the game. Today when I got from work, I've been trying to play it, but my ping spiked to 600 every 10 seconds. It becomes stable for some time, and then in a middle of a fight (of course), it jumps back to 500-600 and I get "Attempting to reconnect" popup just to find myself dead 5 seconds after. It's been so frustrating, please fix your shit riot. I know that my internet connection is flawless and not the problem here, I'm paying good money for it, and also, in dota I have absolutely no problems with it.

replies.body: Lag spikes like this could be due to an unstable connection or packet loss to our game server.  We have a [Log Reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743)that can automatically determine what's going wrong, and provide a step of solutions for your specific issue.  I hope this will help get you back in the game without anymore issues!
